mapper.select: SELECT l.id, t.change_type, t.change_type_desc type, l.create_time, l.reference_number, o.customer_name, o.customer_phone, t.temp_credit_limit_change_amount change_money FROM emp_credit_money_change_log l INNER JOIN emp_employee e ON e.emp_id = l.emp_id INNER JOIN emp_temp_credit_change_log t ON t.id = l.temp_credit_change_id LEFT JOIN ord_base_info o ON o.ord_no = l.reference_number WHERE e.emp_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT l.id, a.change_type, a.change_type_desc type, l.create_time, l.reference_number, o.customer_name, o.customer_phone, a.credit_limit_available_change_amount change_money FROM emp_credit_money_change_log l INNER JOIN emp_employee e ON e.emp_id = l.emp_id INNER JOIN emp_available_credit_change_log a ON a.id = l.available_credit_change_id LEFT JOIN ord_base_info o ON o.ord_no = l.reference_number WHERE e.emp_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT l.id, f.change_type, f.change_type_desc type, l.create_time, l.reference_number, o.customer_name, o.customer_phone, f.fixed_credit_limit_change_amount change_money FROM emp_credit_money_change_log l INNER JOIN emp_employee e ON e.emp_id = l.emp_id INNER JOIN emp_fixed_credit_change_log f ON f.id = l.fixed_credit_change_id LEFT JOIN ord_base_info o ON o.ord_no = l.reference_number WHERE e.emp_id = #{userId}
